titles.title: Federal Pell Grant Eligibility Clarification Act of 2003
A bill to amend the Higher education Act of 1965 to modify the computation of eligibility for certain Federal Pell Grants, and for other purposes.
Federal Pell Grant Eligibility Clarification Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Federal Pell Grant Eligibility Clarification Act of 2003 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise eligibility requirements for certain Pell Grant awards by modifying the formula for determining total income to include consideration of current year circumstances for students residing in States in extended benefit periods under the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002.
